mapper.insert: insert into notify (Notify_id, Message_Content, type, target, action, sender, createAt) values (#{notifyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{messageContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{target,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{action,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createat,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update notify set Message_Content = #{messageContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, target = #{target,jdbcType=INTEGER}, action = #{action,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sender = #{sender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createAt = #{createat,jdbcType=DATE} where Notify_id = #{notifyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select Notify_id, Message_Content, type, target, action, sender, createAt from notify
